ProductInfo.Features:
TTL Autofocus: Multi AF, Center AF, Face Detection AF, Object Tracking AF, Smart Face Recognition AF
Drive: Single, Continuous, AEB, Motion Capture
Motion Photo: Freeze time around a moving subject. Simply shoot the footage and then rub the area on the display where you want action. The photo around it will freeze
Perfect Portrait System: Face Detection, Blink Detection, Smile Shot, Beauty Shot, Self Portrait, Red-eye Fix
Take advantage of creative possibilities, like making a portrait resemble an antique, a landscape on the moon, a 1950's TV set, or in a movie. There are 12 background templates from which to choose and the image quality is sufficient to blow up to poster size
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST150F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Cobalt Black) + 8GB SDHC MicroSD Class 4 Memory Card with Adapter + Carrying Case + Table Top Tripod, Lens Cleaning Kit, LCD Protector + USB SDHC Reader + Memory Wallet
